name.zh_tw: Final. 所有奇迹的起点篇
name.zh_cn_jp: Final. 所有奇迹的起点篇
name.zh_cn_tw: Final. 所有奇迹的起点篇
name.zh_cn_cn: Final. 所有奇迹的起点篇

desc.en: A fissure splits open the daily lives of Kivotos citizens. In a story subverted, where does Schale fall?
desc.jp: A fissure splits open the daily lives of Kivotos citizens. In a story subverted, where does Schale fall?
desc.thai: A fissure splits open the daily lives of Kivotos citizens. In a story subverted, where does Schale fall?
desc.ko: A fissure splits open the daily lives of Kivotos citizens. In a story subverted, where does Schale fall?
desc.zh_tw: 出现于日常的微小裂痕，安稳日子的崩坏仅在转瞬之间——
desc.zh_cn_jp: 出现于日常的微小裂痕，安稳日子的崩坏仅在转瞬之间——
desc.zh_cn_tw: 出现于日常的微小裂痕，安稳日子的崩坏仅在转瞬之间——
desc.zh_cn_cn: 出现于日常的微小裂痕，安稳日子的崩坏仅在转瞬之间——

desc.en: The General Student Council has uncovered anomalies in Kivotos. While Rin convenes an Emergency Response Committee and many forces seek to capitalize on the chaos, will Schale be able to overcome the crisis?
desc.jp: The General Student Council has uncovered anomalies in Kivotos. While Rin convenes an Emergency Response Committee and many forces seek to capitalize on the chaos, will Schale be able to overcome the crisis?
desc.thai: The General Student Council has uncovered anomalies in Kivotos. While Rin convenes an Emergency Response Committee and many forces seek to capitalize on the chaos, will Schale be able to overcome the crisis?
desc.ko: The General Student Council has uncovered anomalies in Kivotos. While Rin convenes an Emergency Response Committee and many forces seek to capitalize on the chaos, will Schale be able to overcome the crisis?
desc.zh_tw: 在奇普托斯各地观测到的微小异常。立于薄冰之上的日常崩坏，疑惑和阴谋彼此纠缠——究竟夏萊能不能克服这个危机呢？
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在奇普托斯各地观测到的微小异常。立于薄冰之上的日常崩坏，疑惑和阴谋彼此纠缠——究竟夏莱能不能克服这个危机呢？
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在奇普托斯各地观测到的微小异常。立于薄冰之上的日常崩坏，疑惑和阴谋彼此纠缠——究竟夏莱能不能克服这个危机呢？
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在奇普托斯各地观测到的微小异常。立于薄冰之上的日常崩坏，疑惑和阴谋彼此纠缠——究竟沙勒能不能克服这个危机呢？
